dob.description: Date of birth. Format YYYY MM DD or YYYY/MM/DD

primary_nationality.description:
Nationality (main).
See [Get nationalties](/api/lookups#available-nationalities) for the list of available nationalities.

secondary_nationality.description:
Nationality (additional).
See [Get nationalties](/api/lookups#available-nationalities) for the list of available nationalities.

citizenship.description: See [Get Countries](/api/lookups#available-countries) for the list of available countries.

id_expiration_date.description: ID expiration date. Format YYYY MM DD or YYYY/MM/DD

country_permanent_residence.description: Country of permanent residence. See [Get Countries](/api/lookups#available-countries) for the list of available countries.

id_permanent_residence.description: ID for country of permanent residence

permanent_residence_registration_date.description: Registration date for country of permanent residence. Format YYYY MM DD or YYYY/MM/DD

country_temporary_residence.description: Country of temporary residence. See [Get Countries](/api/lookups#available-countries) for the list of available countries

id_temporary_residence.description: ID for country of temporary residence

political_exposure.description: Description of political exposure (if pep is 'Yes')

primary_language.description: AML system language key. See [Get Languages](/api/lookups#available-languages) for the list of available languages

secondary_language.description: AML system language key. See [Get Languages](/api/lookups#available-languages) for the list of available languages

country.description: Country of residence. See [Get Countries](/api/lookups#available-countries) for the list of available countries.

residence_region.description: Region of residence. See [Get Regions](/api/lookups#available-regions) for the list of available regions.

residence_province.description: Province of residence. See [Get Provinces](/api/lookups#available-provinces) for the list of available provinces.

residence_city.description: City of residence. See [Get Cities](/api/lookups#available-cities) for the list of available cities.

main_head_address_same.description: Is address of main activity is same

main_activity_country.description: Country - Main activity. See [Get Countries](/api/lookups#available-countries) for the list of available countries.

main_activity_region.description: Region - Main activity. See [Get Regions](/api/lookups#available-regions) for the list of available regions.

main_activity_province.description: Province - Main activity. See [Get Provinces](/api/lookups#available-provinces) for the list of available provinces.

main_activity_city.description: City - Main activity. See [Get Cities](/api/lookups#available-cities) for the list of available cities.
